diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $ZY$ is $5x - 7$ units.
The length of the line $ZX$ is $3x + 5$ units.
Point $X$ lies on the line segment $WE$.
Point $Y$ lies on the line segment $WN$.
Point $Z$ lies on the line segment $WA$.
Lines $WX$ and $ZX$ are perpendicular to each other.
Lines $WY$ and $ZY$ are perpendicular to each other.
